help.info: Converts the i-th mode of a PWA system to an LTI system
help.descr: For a PWA system consisting of M local affine models, this function converts the index-th model to an instance of the LTISystem class.

input.name: index
input.descr: Index of the local model to extract.

output.name: ltisys
output.descr: LTI representation of the i-th local model.
